trans-unit.source: Maintains a group of names for related code entities or type mappings that are generated by the .NET Framework's XML serialization infrastructure.
The following list identifies tools and classes that use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers>:
trans-unit.target: 以下列表标识工具和类使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers>:

trans-unit.source: The [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88), or the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: [Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)，或<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter>类，而从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象的服务器类。

trans-unit.source: The [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) tool while generating classes from XML Schema Definition (XSD) documents.
trans-unit.target: [XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)时从 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档中生成类的工具。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> class while creating <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects from classes that are identified as Web services via the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>类在创建时<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>从作为 Web 服务通过标识的类的对象<xref:System.Web.Services.WebServiceAttribute>属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers> class directly, use the aforementioned tools or classes.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers>直接类，而使用前面提到的工具或类。

trans-unit.source: If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: Depending on its scope, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers> instance can be used to maintain the names of any of the items in the following list:
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于其作用域，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers>实例用于维护任何以下列表中的项的名称：

trans-unit.source: Types, methods, or fields.
trans-unit.target: 类型、 方法或字段。

trans-unit.source: The parameters and return value of a method corresponding to WSDL input and output messages.
trans-unit.target: 参数和返回值对应于 WSDL 方法的输入和输出消息。

trans-unit.source: Objects within a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> instance that can be serialized to a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: 对象内<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>将序列化到 WSDL 文档的实例。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the class is used to avoid naming collisions between code entities within a particular scope, including collisions with the name of a containing entity.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，类用于避免命名冲突之间在特定范围内，包括包含实体的名称冲突的代码实体。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> class.
<see langword="true" /> if identifiers are case sensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> class and determines whether code identifiers are case sensitive.
A name that is used to index the code entity.
The code entity or type mapping information.
Adds a named code entity or type mapping to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> instance's scope.
Unlike the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddUnique%2A> method, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.Add%2A> method does not prevent naming collisions.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddUnique%2A>方法，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.Add%2A>方法不会阻止命名冲突。

trans-unit.source: If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性而不创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers>类。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: A name that will not be available within the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> instance's scope.
Prevents a specified name from being used within the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> instance's scope.
A reserved name can belong to a containing code entity, such as a type for which member names must also be generated.
trans-unit.target: 保留的名称可以属于包含的代码实体，如为其也必须生成成员名称的类型。

trans-unit.source: A candidate name that is used to index the code entity.
The code entity or type mapping information.
Adds a named code entity or type mapping to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> instance's scope, ensuring that the name is unique within the scope.
The identifier parameter value or a modified string if there is a name collision.
If the identifier parameter value is not unique within the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers> instance's scope, a new, unique string is generated and used in its place.
trans-unit.target: 如果标识符参数值内不唯一<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers>生成实例的作用域，新的唯一字符串并将其在其位置中使用。

trans-unit.source: The new string is generated by appending to the input name.
trans-unit.target: 新字符串生成的将追加到输入的名称。

trans-unit.source: The original name is not unique if it was passed previously to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddUnique%2A>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddReserved%2A> method, or if it was generated by a previous call to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddUnique%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 原始名称不是唯一如果以前曾传递给<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddUnique%2A>，或<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddReserved%2A>方法，或如果它由以前调用生成<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddUnique%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In each case, if the new identifier is not unique, it is first passed to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.MakeUnique%2A> method to create a new unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: 在每种情况下，如果新的标识符不是唯一的它第一次传递到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.MakeUnique%2A>方法来创建新的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性而不创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers>类。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: Removes all code entities or type mappings, including their names, from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> instance's scope.
Reserved names, as added through the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddReserved%2A> method, are not removed.
trans-unit.target: 保留名称，如通过添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddReserved%2A>方法，不会删除。

trans-unit.source: If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性而不创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers>类。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name to check for use within the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> instance's scope.
Determines whether a specified name is already being used within the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> instance's scope.
<see langword="true" /> if the name is already in use; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The input name is not unique if it was passed previously to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddUnique%2A>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddReserved%2A> method, or if it was generated by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddUnique%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 输入的名称不是唯一如果以前曾传递给<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddUnique%2A>，或<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddReserved%2A>方法，或如果它由生成<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddUnique%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性而不创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers>类。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name to possibly modify.
Ensures that the input is of the correct case by modifying the name according to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.UseCamelCasing" /> property.
A string that is the same as the input identifier or has the first letter's case modified.
If the value of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.UseCamelCasing%2A> property is `true` and the first character of the input is a letter, it is made lowercase, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.UseCamelCasing%2A>属性是`true`和输入的第一个字符是一个字母，则它由大小写，如有必要。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.UseCamelCasing%2A> is `false`, Pascal case is in effect and the first character, if a letter, is capitalized, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.UseCamelCasing%2A>是`false`、 Pascal 大小写是否生效，并且第一个字符，如果一个字母，大写，如有必要。

trans-unit.source: The name to modify if it is not already unique.
Determines whether the input name conflicts with another name within the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> instance's scope and, if it does, generates a modified string.
The identifier parameter value or a modified string if there is a name collision.

The input name is not unique if it was passed previously to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddUnique%2A>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddReserved%2A> method, or if it was generated by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddUnique%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 输入的名称不是唯一如果以前曾传递给<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddUnique%2A>，或<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddReserved%2A>方法，或如果它由生成<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers.AddUnique%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the name is not unique, a new string is generated by appending to the original string.
trans-unit.target: 如果名称不是唯一的则通过将追加到原始字符串生成新的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性而不创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers>类。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the code entity or type mapping information to remove.
Removes from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> instance's scope the code entity or type mapping identified by the input name.

If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性而不创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers>类。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: A name that will be made available within the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> instance's scope.
Removes the input name from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> instance's reserved names.

If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性而不创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers>类。

trans-unit.source: The type of all the code entities or type mappings for the instance.
Returns an array of the code entities or type mappings within the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> instance's scope.
An array of the code entities or type mappings that is stored by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers" /> object.

If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性而不创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers>类。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the instance uses camel case.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate that the instance uses camel case; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that the instance uses Pascal case.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 若要指示该实例使用 camel 大小写;<see langword="false" />以指示该实例使用 Pascal 大小写。

trans-unit.source: With camel case, if the first character of an identifier is a letter, it must be lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 使用 camel 大小写，如果标识符的第一个字符是一个字母，它必须为小写。

trans-unit.source: With Pascal case, if the first character is a letter, it must be uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Pascal 大小写，如果第一个字符是一个字母，它必须是大写。
